recipe.name: Asparagus Risotto
recipe.ingredients: 120 grams white onion (1 medium onion), peeled and cut in quarters 28 grams butter (2 tablespoons) 62 grams (1/4 cup) white wine or white cooking wine 190 grams (1 cup) Arborio rice 4 cups chicken or vegetable stock 1/2 teaspoon salt (or to taste) 225 grams asparagus, cleaned and cut into 1/4 inch slices 40 grams (1/2 cup) grated or shredded parmesan cheese, plus more to add at serving time to each dish.

step.describe: Open lid and use spatula to scrape down the sides so onions are at the bottom.
Add 4 cups stock and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Stir in parmesan cheese with the spatula. Taste for seasoning and add salt, if needed.
Serve hot. Sprinkle with additional parmesan cheese for garnish, or pass extra cheese at the table.
